data.name: MX vs ATV Legends - Customization Pack
data.detailed_description: This DLC contains an exclusive customization pack for your rider and your rides!
data.about_the_game: This DLC contains an exclusive customization pack for your rider and your rides!
data.short_description: This DLC contains an exclusive customization pack for your rider and your rides!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Russian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: 3.5 GHz with 4 Cores
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 770 / R9 280X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 35 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: 4GHz with 4 Cores
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 1070 / RX 5700
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 35 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
